text: I read today that a 5th grader committed suicide recently….I am incredibly saddened and pray his spirit is at rest.  Whatever burdens a school age child has in tow, please know you are valued, loved, and appreciated….We need you!

author: Being of Light
text: Sooooo………..calling me repetitively does not make me want to answer the phone!  Even if you switch the number to unknown caller……the response with be the same!

author: Being of Light
text: A conversation today ended up being a teachable moment!!!! I use Sunday as a reset day. God, peace, grounding, etc. to prepare for the work week. You can’t tell my method’s are wrong because you don’t agree…..I didn’t invite you here…..learn to be mindful of words…

author: Being of Light
text:
Petpeeve!!!! Don’t ask me if I was doing something I just TOLD you I was doing.
Him: How are you?
Me: I’m well just finished mowing and edging the yard.
Him: You we’re out mowing the grass?? https://t.co/qWmY1ZrMKv

text: Forgiveness is hard when those close to are the offender!!! Still dig deep and allow forgiveness in, but it forever altars things and that’s okay! Be Love. Be Light. Be You! #NAMASTE’

author: Being of Light
text: A few things to ponder……..sometimes WE are in our own way……Recognize when You are the problem….Please stop getting angry if someone tells you NO…..there is a reason behind it…..It is perfectly okay to limit people’s access to you! Be well souls! 🙏🏽❤️
